GConf2.note: initially added as a dependency of protobuf, for netdata

ImageMagick.note: initially added as a dependency of protobuf, for netdata

OpenEXR.note: initially added as a dependency of protobuf, for netdata

PyPAM.note: likely a dependency of a XS package we don't include

adwaita-icon-theme.note: initially added as a dependency of protobuf, for netdata

alsa-lib.note: initially added as a dependency of protobuf, for netdata

at-spi2-atk.note: initially added as a dependency of protobuf, for netdata

at-spi2-core.note: initially added as a dependency of protobuf, for netdata

auto-cert-kit.note: A tool provided by XenServer to their partners for certification

autoconf-archive.note: built but not used by us

automake16.note: not used in XCP-ng at the moment

bpftool.note: not used in XCP-ng at the moment

capstone.note: packaged, but unused in XCP-ng at the moment

cmake3.note: Initially imported by us, XS started using it. For XS 8, they forked cmake-3.26.4-4.fc37.src.rpm. At first, we keep ours because we found nothing that would require cmake3 in recent updates

colord.note: initially added as a dependency of protobuf, for netdata

compiler-rt18.note: not used in XCP-ng at the moment

coretemp-module-alt.note: added to workaround missing CPU temperature sensors in dom0, doesn't work anymore in 8.3

corosync.note: Required for clustering (GFS2), a feature we don't support. Was also required to build lvm2's lvm2-cluster subpackage. lvm2 rebuilt without cvcluster support and corosync removed from dom0, along with dlm

dbus-glib.note: initially added as a dependency of protobuf, for netdata

dconf.note: initially added as a dependency of protobuf, for netdata

desktop-file-utils.note: initially added as a build dependency of htop and of protobuf (for netdata)

devtoolset-11-elfutils.note: Packaged but not really used in XCP-ng

dlm.note: Was a requirement of corosync, but we don't include corosync anymore in dom0. Was also a build dep for one of lvm2's subpackages, that we don't build anymore to remove the build dependency towards dlm. We also removed dlm from xs-opam-repo.

epel-release.note: replaced in XCP-ng by xcp-ng-release, which adds EPEL by default, but disabled

giflib.note: initially added as a dependency of protobuf, for netdata

glib-networking.note: initially added as a dependency of protobuf, for netdata

gsettings-desktop-schemas.note: initially added as a dependency of protobuf, for netdata

ilmbase.note: initially added as a dependency of protobuf, for netdata

kernel-livepatch.note: livepatches not supported in XCP-ng at the moment

libXtst.note: initially added as a dependency of protobuf, for netdata

libbpf.note: unused in XCP-ng at the moment

libcgroup.note: unused, same version as el7, why?

libepoxy.note: initially added as a dependency of protobuf, for netdata

libgusb.note: initially added as a dependency of protobuf, for netdata

libhbalinux.note: remains of old releases, not used anymore

liblockfile.note: initially added as a dependency of protobuf, for netdata

libotf.note: initially added as a dependency of protobuf, for netdata

libsoup.note: initially added as a dependency of protobuf, for netdata

libvirt.note: Used to be a dependency for systemtap, in 8.2

libwmf.note: initially added as a dependency of protobuf, for netdata

libxkbcommon.note: initially added as a dependency of protobuf, for netdata

livepatch-build-tools.note: Used to be a dep for livepatch-utils which is proprietary. We don't really use it as we don't support live patches, but we kept packaging it

m17n-db.note: initially added as a dependency of protobuf, for netdata

m17n-lib.note: initially added as a dependency of protobuf, for netdata

m2crypto.note: TODO determine where it came from and whether we use it at all

mbootpack.note: Unused in XCP-ng at the moment.

mozjs17.note: initially added as a dependency of protobuf, for netdata

mpdecimal.note: Not used in XCP-ng at the moment

nagios-plugins.note: XS specific feature, maybe include it later

netdata.note: netdata package for XO, netdata-ui for users

oprofile.note: Not used in XCP-ng at the moment

pbis-open.note: unused, likely linked to proprietary pbis-to-winbind

pbis-open-upgrade.note: unused, likely linked to proprietary upgrade-pbis-to-winbind

polkit.note: initially added as a dependency of protobuf, for netdata

polkit-pkla-compat.note: initially added as a dependency of protobuf, for netdata

protobuf.note: dep and builddep for netdata, which needs protobuf 3

protobuf-c.note: dep and builddep for netdata, which needs a version of protobuf-c compatible with protobuf 3

python-asn1crypto.note: Used to be dep for proprietary secureboot-certificates. Unneeded.

rest.note: dep of protobuf, needed for netdata

rsyslog.note: updated by us to rsyslog-8.24.0-52.el7_8.2 for memory leak fixes. Dependency libfastjson not updated but would need to be if we used the mm-normalize plugin (RHBZ #1591493)

ruby.note: Not used in XCP-ng at the moment

sbd.note: Not used in XCP-ng at the moment. "storage-based death functionality"

tix.note: Not used in XCP-ng at the moment

xcp-ng-deps.note: meta package that defines default installation

xen-livepatch.note: We don't support livepatches at the moment

xencert.note: automated testkit for certifying storage hardware with XenServer

xenserver-nagios-plugins.note: XS specific feature, maybe include it later
